title: Conduct Daily Team Huddle
description: A manager starts the day by leading a team huddle to communicate daily sales goals and priorities.

tasks.description: Access the store performance dashboard to review yesterday's sales results and today's sales goal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager retrieves the key performance indicators for the huddle.

tasks.description: Review the list of key tasks and promotions for the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is aware of the day's operational priorities.

tasks.description: Communicate the sales goals and key tasks to the team.
tasks.expected_outcome: The store team is informed and aligned on the goals for the day.
